Isidingo bụ soap opera  nke South Africa, nwere asụsụ mkparịta ụka na  isiXhosa
Usoro Ihe nkiri  a malitere na SABC 3 na Julaị 1998 wee gbasaa na mgbede na SABC 3 site na Mọnde ruo Fraịde na 19:00
Ruo 2001, akpọrọ ya Isidingo: The Need
Grey Hofmeyr mebere ya, akụkọ ahụ na-adabere na Soap opera ọzọ na-ewu ewu nke Hofmeyr, The Villagers mere, nke a na-agbasa n'oge ọchịchị apartheid na South Africa

Ndị na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ gụnyere Neil McCarthy, Mitzi Booysen, Ilse van Hermert, Christian Blomkamp, Busisiwe Ntintili, Loyiso Maqoma, Liam J Stratton, Rohan Dickson, Bongi Ndaba, na Duduzile Zamantungwa Mabaso.
N'abali iri abụọ na iteghete nke ọnwa Nọvemba 2019 SABC kwupụtara na a ga-akagbu mmepụta  na mgbasa ozi ikpeazụ na-agbasa na 12 Maachị 2020.
Ndị isi akụkọ gụnyere ezinụlọ Haines, Matabanes, Vusi Molettane onye njikwa ogbunigwe na ndị dị iche iche bi n'ụlọ obibi nke Maggie Webster nwere
Barker Haines, onye nwe ON TV, bụ onye na-ebi ndụ dị elu nke na-emekarị atụmatụ ịbanye na ndụ ndị dị iche iche na n'ime obodo na- egwupụta ihe na Horizon Deep, karịsịa nwa ya nwanyị Leone
Matabanes bụ ezinụlọ nwere njikọ chiri anya nke nwere ebe siri ike, n'ụdị, na ndị mmadụ Horizon Deep, yana Zebedee dị ka nna ochie
Ndị ngosipụta agwa ndị ọzọ gụnyere  Lolly De Klerk, Frank Xavier, Parsons Matibane, Georgie Zamdela na Calvin Xavier.

Onye na-eme  ihe nkiri bụ Michelle Botes, onye ngosipụta agwa dị ka villainess Cherel De Villiers kemgbe Isidingo ' s 1998 mpụta mbụ, Ekwupụtara ọpụpụ ọ dị nso na usoro ahụ na Ọktoba 2006, otu izu ka South African Television Awards gbacharsvya nkiti (n'agbanyeghị Isidingo ewela chala ọtụtụ ihe nrite).  Ngosiputa Botes ọzọ dị ka Ingrid n'ihe nkiri Binnelanders, nke ya na Isidingo mara aka n'usoro ụgwọ nke M-Net
Ọ laghachiri Isidingo site na 2010 ruo 2013.

N'oge na-adịghị mgbe ọ nwetasịrị ihe nrite ome kacha mma na ihe nkiri South Africa na Televishon Awards maka ihe ngosi ya dị ka Leone, "Lee" Haines, onye na-eme ihe nkiri gbara afọ iri atọ na abụọ bụ Ashley Callie nwụrụ n'ihi ihe mberede ụgbọ ala na February 2008
A naghị emegharị ọrụ ahụ, ma e dere agwa ahụ site n'ịgosipụta Lee ka ọ bụrụ onye n'efu efu maka ọ pụtaghị ọrụ, ma mesịa gosi na ọ nwụọla n'ubi agbahapụrụ na-akọwaghị ihe kpatara ọnwụ ya

Ọnwa isii ka Callie nwụsịrị, usoro ahụ wepụrụ onye ngosipụta agwa bụ Letti Matabane (nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri Lesego Motsepe n'egosi) n'ihe mberede ụgbọ ala yiri nke ahụ, kpalitere "mwusa iru újú mba niile"
Isidingo bụ ihe nkiri TV South Africa izizi gosipụtara nsusu ọnụ ndị nwoke nwere mmasị nwoke na mba ahụ, bụ nke hụrụ ome abụọ bụ Steve na Len ịsusu ọnụ
O mekwara akụkọ ihe mere eme mgbe ọ na-egosipụta agbamakwụkwọ mbụ ndị mmekọ nwoke na nwanyị na telivishọn South Africa mgbe ndị ome ihe nkiri bụ Steve na Luke gbara akwụkwọ
Ekesara ihe omume a ụbọchị ole na ole ka e kwadochara alụmdi na nwunye nwoke na nwoke na nwanyị na nwanyị na South Africa na 2006

Onye isi na-emepụta ihe nkiri ahụ Pumla Hopa kọwara otú Isidingo si dị iche na ihe nkiri soap opera ndị ọzọ n’oge ahụ, sị: “Ihe na-eme ka anyị dị iche bụ na anyị na-eleba anya n’ihe dị n'obodo ndị metụtara nwoke idina nwoke, ịkpa ókè agbụrụ, alụmdi na nwunye gwakọtara ọnụ na HIV-Aids
Anyị webatara ụdị akụkọ dị iche."
